title: Evaluation context for an XDM expression
description: Contains a value binding map where each key denotes a parameter or context object by name and the map value contains a reference to an XDM object that is resolved at runtime. The resolved XDM object is set as the context or parameter object for the evaluation of the function.

xdm-function-evaluation-datatype.title: Evaluation context for the expression in the profile constraint
xdm-function-evaluation-datatype.description: Contains a value binding map where each key denotes a parameter by name and the value contains a reference that is resolved at runtime.

additionalProperties.title: Parameter binding for context object.
additionalProperties.description: Contains a locator or reference to determine the value of a parameter for invocating a function.
